official_title: A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to require that rehabilitation counselors hired under State plans approved under such Act have certain minimum qualifications.

summary.text: Amends the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to establish minimum qualification standards for rehabilitation counselors hired pursuant to State plans under such Act. Specifies the nature of such standards with respect to the course work in rehabilitation counseling and/or the acceptable experience.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to require that rehabilitation counselors hired under State plans approved under such Act have certain minimum qualifications.
